attributes.action: The Prime Minister must stand down.
attributes.additional_details:
The Prime Minister is not fulfilling his first duty of keeping the Public safe especially regarding 20000 to 30000 suspected people on the watch list and allowing illegal immigrants to continue to cross the Channel after he made hollow promises to stop this.

Promises are not being kept and the situation in the Country regarding possible terrorist attacks is getting worse.
attributes.background: Parliament must insist that the Prime Minister stands down.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or resign.
